desc: Welcome to Soul Fire Candles. This is my store for soy candles made out of 100% pure soy wax. Also made with pure essential oils as well. Great for aromatherapy and relaxation after a long day of work. My candles are 100% toxic free. Available in Lavender and Jasmine. Coming soon Egyptian musk.

layout.text: Introducing our Limited Edition Sweet Summer Dreams cotton candy scented candles. Bring home the whimsical experience of childhood memories of Summer!
